content.prompt: The intent of the Dawes Act of 1887 was to

choices.label: assimilate American Indians into the mainstream of American culture
recognize and preserve the tribal cultures of American Indians
legally establish the communal nature of American Indian landholding
restore to American Indians land seized unjustly
remove all American Indians to the Indian Territory (Oklahoma)

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
